00037     function method_getUsersAndRoles($params)
00038     {                                                                           
00039                 $result                 = array();
00040         
00041         // get lists of users and roles ordered by name
00042                 $users                  = $this->getAll($this->key_descriptiveName);
00043                 $roles                  = $this->role->getAll($this->role->key_descriptiveName);
00044                 $userRoles              = $this->role->getByUserId();
00045                 $parentNodeIds  = array();
00046                 
00047                 foreach ( $roles as $index => $role )
00048                 {
00049                     $roleId     = $role[$this->role->key_id];
00050                     $namedId    = $role[$this->role->key_namedId];
00051                         $name           = $role[$this->role->key_descriptiveName];
00052                         $label          = $name ? $name : $namedId;                                              
00053                         
00054                     $result[] = array(
00055                         'parentNode'    => 0,
00056                         'isBranch'              => true,
00057                                 'label'                 => $label,
00058                                 'bOpened'               => true,
00059                                 'data'                  => array (
00060                                                                                 type    => "qcl.auth.types.Role",
00061                                                                                 id              => $roleId,
00062                                                                                 namedId => $namedId,
00063                                                                                 name    => $name
00064                                                                         )
00065                         );                              
00066                         // parent node id to which the following nodes will be added
00067                         $parentNodeIds[$roleId]=$index+1;
00068                 }
00069                 
00070                 // render tree after creating users
00071                 $result[] = array( 'command' => "render" );
00072                 
00073         foreach ( $users as $index => $user )
00074         {
00075                     $userId     = $user[$this->key_id];
00076                     $namedId    = $user[$this->key_namedId];
00077                         $name           = $user[$this->key_descriptiveName];
00078                         $label          = "$name ($namedId)";
00079                         
00080                         // add to roles
00081                         $myRoleIds      = $userRoles[$userId];
00082                         
00083                         foreach ( $myRoleIds as $roleId )                       
00084                         {
00085                                 $parentNodeId = $parentNodeIds[$roleId];
00086                                 
00087                             $result[] = array(
00088                                         'parentNodeId'  => $parentNodeId,
00089                                         'bOpened'               => true,
00090                                         'label'                 => $label,
00091                                         'icon'                  => $this->icon,
00092                                         'iconSelected'  => $this->icon,
00093                                         'data'                  => array (
00094                                                                                         type    => "qcl.auth.types.User",
00095                                                                                         id              => $userId,
00096                                                                                         namedId => $namedId,
00097                                                                                         name    => $name
00098                                                                                 )
00099                                 );
00100                         }
00101         }       
00102 
00103                 // return data
00104                 $this->set( 'treedatamodel', $result );
00105                 return $this->getResult();
00106     }

00111     function method_getRolesAndPermissions( )
00112     {                                                                                                   
00113                 $result                 = array();
00114         
00115         // get ordered lists of roles and permissions 
00116                 $roles                          = $this->role->getAll($this->role->key_descriptiveName);
00117                 $permissions            = $this->permission->getAll($this->permission->key_namedId);
00118                 $permissionRoles        = $this->permission->getByRoleId();
00119                 $parentNodeIds          = array();
00120                 
00121                 foreach ( $roles as $index => $role )
00122                 {
00123                     $roleId     = $role[$this->role->key_id];
00124                     $namedId    = $role[$this->role->key_namedId];
00125                         $name           = $role[$this->role->key_descriptiveName];
00126                         $label          = "$name ($namedId)";                                            
00127                         
00128                     $result[] = array(
00129                         'parentNode'    => 0,
00130                         'isBranch'              => true,
00131                                 'label'                 => $label,
00132                                 'bOpened'               => true,                                
00133                                 'data'                  => array (
00134                                                                                 type    => "qcl.auth.types.Role",
00135                                                                                 id              => $roleId,
00136                                                                                 namedId => $namedId,
00137                                                                                 name    => $name
00138                                                                         )
00139                         );                              
00140                         // parent node id to which the following nodes will be added
00141                         $parentNodeIds[$roleId]=$index+1;
00142                 }
00143                 
00144                 // render tree after creating users
00145                 $result[] = array( 'command' => "render" );
00146 
00147         foreach ( $permissions as $index => $permission )
00148         {
00149                     $permissionId       = $permission[$this->permission->key_id];
00150                     $namedId            = $permission[$this->permission->key_namedId];
00151                         $name                   = $permission[$this->permission->key_descriptiveName];
00152                         $label                  = $name? "$name ($namedId)" : $namedId;
00153                         
00154                         // add to roles
00155                         $myRoleIds      = $permissionRoles[$permissionId];
00156 
00157                         foreach ( $myRoleIds as $roleId )                       
00158                         {
00159                                 $parentNodeId = $parentNodeIds[$roleId];
00160                                 
00161                             $result[] = array(
00162                                         'parentNodeId'  => $parentNodeId,
00163                                         'bOpened'               => true,
00164                                         'label'                 => $label,
00165                                         'icon'                  => $this->permission->icon,
00166                                         'iconSelected'  => $this->permission->icon,
00167                                         'data'                  => array (
00168                                                                                         type    => "qcl.auth.types.Permission",
00169                                                                                         id              => $permissionId,
00170                                                                                         namedId => $namedId,
00171                                                                                         name    => $name
00172                                                                                 )
00173                                 );
00174                         }
00175         }       
00176 
00177                 // return data
00178                 $this->set( 'treedatamodel', $result );
00179                 return $this->getResult();
00180     }

00188     function method_getPermissionNode ( $params )
00189     {
00190                 $permissionId = $params[0]; 
00191                 $parentNodeId = $params[1];
00192                 $result = array();
00193                 
00194                 $permission = $this->permission->getById($permissionId);
00195 
00196             $namedId            = $permission[$this->permission->key_namedId];
00197                 $name                   = $permission[$this->permission->key_descriptiveName];
00198                 $label                  = $name? "$name ($namedId)" : $namedId;
00199 
00200             $result[] = array(
00201                         'parentNodeId'  => $parentNodeId,
00202                         'bOpened'               => true,
00203                         'bSelected'             => true,
00204                         'label'                 => $label,
00205                         'icon'                  => $this->permission->icon,
00206                         'iconSelected'  => $this->permission->icon,
00207                         'data'                  => array (
00208                                                                         type    => "qcl.auth.types.Permission",
00209                                                                         id              => $permissionId,
00210                                                                         namedId => $namedId,
00211                                                                         name    => $name
00212                                                                 )
00213                 );              
00214 
00215                 $this->set( 'treedatamodel', $result );
00216                 return $this->getResult();
00217     }

00225     function method_getUserNode ( $params )
00226     {

00228                 $parentNodeId   = $params[1];
00229                 $result = array();
00230                 
00231                 $user = $this->getById($userId);
00232 
00233             $namedId    = $user[$this->key_namedId];
00234                 $name           = $user[$this->key_descriptiveName];
00235                 $label          = "$name ($namedId)";
00236                 
00237             $result[] = array(
00238                         'parentNodeId'  => $parentNodeId,
00239                         'bOpened'               => true,

00241                         'label'                 => $label,
00242                         'icon'                  => $this->icon,
